column1: #Text=You 've already made it clear how you feel about me .
#Text=" Mako says : " No , I have n't .
#Text=What I 'm trying to say is : as much as you drive me crazy , I also think you 're pretty amazing .
#Text=" Korra says : " So you do like me ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes , but , I like Asami , too .
#Text=I do n't know , things are complicated .
#Text=I 've been feeling really confused and — " Mako says : " Bolin , this is n't what you think !
#Text=" Korra says : " You kissed me back !
